pageContext.claim: “Crazy Joe Scarborough and dumb as a rock Mika are not bad people, but their low rated show is dominated by their NBC bosses. Too bad!”
pageContext.analysis: According to Ad Week: "Morning Joe had a solid quarter in its own right. Not only did it defeat its rival [CNN] New Day in total viewers for the 9th straight quarter, but its 997,000 total viewer average represents a quarterly audience record for MSNBC in the 6 – 9 a.m. time period." After Trump attacked the hosts on Twitter, the show broke its ratings record.
